chapter.title: Design Overview
chapter.para: &THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION; provides user with NIO like transport abstraction. User works with:

listitem.para: Channel provider - factory class which creates concrete implementaion of channel, which hides transport details.
Selector - object which can be queried about state of channel I/O operations.
Selection key - object encapsulating information about I/O ready channel.
M3UA Messages and Parameters - objects representing specific metadata, like SS7 protocol message, M3UA management messages, etc...
